# `create_terra_spatRaster`

Load image as a terra spatRaster object


## Description

Load image as a terra spatRaster object


## Usage

```r
create_terra_spatRaster(image_path)
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`image_path`     |     existing full filepath to image to be loaded as a terra spatRaster
